title: IceCubeGoldAndBronzeTracks
description: IceCube Astrotrack Gold And Bronze track alert events

type.description: Notice type Astrotrack Gold or Bronze

energy.description: Most probable neutrino energy [TeV] that would have produced an event

signalness.description: Probability [dn] that this is an astrophysical signal relative to backgrounds

far.description: Rate of background events expected similar to alert event that would be seen by IceCube per year
